pages.text: A lot of the recipies for the dungeon keys require large quantities of wood, and since we all hate gathering logs, we should build a farm. How? $(h)Bonsai Trees$(). This entry will teach you how you can craft and use bonsai pots in order to create automatic farms for all the vanilla wood types. Good luck!

pages.title: Standard Bonsai Pots
pages.text: You will first need to unlock the $(h)Tiny Agriculture$() upgrade for 1 Phat Crystal in the upgrades menu. Once you have done that, you will be able to craft the bonsai pot.

Simply place some dirt inside it, and then a sapling of your choice. Now, just wait for your bonsai tree to grow! Once it does so, you can chop it down by $(h)Right Clicking$() with any axe. However, you may have realised that this is will take a lot of time, and it may even be worth it to farm manually. Fear Not!

pages.title: Hopping Bonsai Pots
pages.text: You can convert your bonsai pot into a hopping one as shown above. This bonsai pot will automatically output items produced to any valid storage below the block. Enjoy!
